title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Go CLI and server that bundles, serves and manages large language models locally; supports Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client library for the Ollama API; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that talks to the local Ollama server; markdown, code highlighting, model manager.

title: chainlit/chainlit-ollama
summary: Cookbook showing how to plug Ollama models into Chainlit conversational AI apps with one Python file.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama-hosted models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate, refactor and chat with code using Ollama models directly inside the editor.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Lightweight Telegram bot that forwards messages to a local Ollama instance and streams replies back to users.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app template demonstrating how to integrate Ollama with session state and streaming.

title: ollama-rag
summary: End-to-end RAG example: PDF ingestion, Ollama embeddings, Chroma vector store and Llama-2 chat for answers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) and docker-compose snippets for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated list of 100+ models (Llama-3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) ready to pull and run with one command.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for discussions, troubleshooting and showcases around the Ollama ecosystem.

title: ollama-hackernews
summary: Hacker News thread announcing Ollama v0.1.30 with multi-modal vision support; 400+ comments on local AI tooling.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: PyPI page for the official ollama Python package; download stats, changelog and quick-start snippet.

title: ollama-npm
summary: NPM page for the official ollama JavaScript package; weekly downloads and API reference.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook collecting recipes for fine-tuning, Modelfile hacks, CI integration and edge deployments.
